Examples ​

Example

To find all available menus, go to More.

Example: Deep nesting

Ensure Skip filtered chapters is enabled at More -> Settings -> Reader under the section Reading.

Example: Deep nesting 2

In More -> Settings -> Advanced, try Clear cache and Clear cookies.
